title: GLOBAL REPARATIONS with Olúfẹmi O. Táíwò
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary:
A deep dive into the philosophy of reparations with Olúfẹmi O. Táíwò. We cover the context & questions asked, Rawls, Nozick, arguments for equality, & harm repair vs constructivst accounts of reparations.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LKq83FUsCIM&t=3365s
itunes:subtitle: A deep dive into the philosophy of reparations wi…
description:
A deep dive into the philosophy of reparations with Olúfẹmi O. Táíwò. We cover the context & questions asked, Rawls, Nozick, arguments for equality, & harm repair vs constructivst accounts of reparations.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LKq83FUsCIM&t=3365s
